content:
IProvideStarLayoutInfo Interface

Definition

Provides the data needed for the star layout.

In this Article

public interface IProvideStarLayoutInfo : System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.IProvideStarLayoutInfoBase

Remarks

By default, the panels that lay out the ribbon use star sizing to show the largest possible control variation that can fit in the available space. Star sizing is a convention where the available space is divided evenly between the elements that need to occupy the space. The name derives from the fact that you specify star sizing by using an asterisk (*) in XAML.

Properties

StarLayoutCombinations

Gets a collection that contains the non-overlapping star combinations.

public System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.StarLayoutInfo> StarLayoutCombinations { get; }
Value
IEnumerable<StarLayoutInfo>

A collection that contains the non-overlapping star combinations.

Methods

OnStarSizeAllocationCompleted()

Called when space allocation is complete.

public void OnStarSizeAllocationCompleted ();
